上.definition: (bound form) up; upper; above; previous; first (of multiple parts); to climb; to get onto; to go up; to attend (class or university); (directional complement) up; (noun suffix) on; above

上一次當，學一次乖.pinyin: shang4 yi1 ci4 dang4 , xue2 yi1 ci4 guai1

上一號.definition: (coll.) to go pee; to go to the bathroom

上上之策.definition: the best policy; the best thing one can do in the circumstances

上下.definition: up and down; top and bottom; old and young; length; about; more or less

上不得臺盤.definition: (idiom) lacking in social grace and unfit to be a representative

上乘.definition: first-class; best quality; also pr. [shang4 sheng4]

上了年紀.definition: to be getting on in years; to be of the older generation

上來.definition: to come up; to approach; (verb complement indicating success)

上供.definition: to make offerings (to gods or ancestors); to offer gifts to superiors in order to win their favor

上個.definition: first (of two parts); last (week etc); previous; the above

上升.definition: to rise; to go up; to ascend
